In a world where humans have colonized the ocean, a young boy named Kai discovers he has the extraordinary ability to breathe underwater without any assistance. As he explores the depths of the ocean, he meets a group of mermaids who are being hunted by a ruthless sea captain. Kai joins forces with the mermaids to protect them and uncover the secrets of his unique gift. Along the way, he learns about the interconnectedness of all living beings and the importance of preserving the ocean's delicate balance.

In a post-apocalyptic future, a group of survivors must navigate the treacherous underwater ruins of an ancient city. The protagonist, a young woman named Aria, possesses a rare genetic trait that allows her to breathe underwater. As she explores the ruins, she discovers a hidden underwater laboratory where scientists had been experimenting with genetic engineering. Aria must navigate the dangers of the ruins, avoid rival factions, and uncover the truth about her own past and the secrets of the laboratory.

In a world where magic is a real and powerful force, a young boy named Lyra discovers he has the ability to communicate with sea creatures and breathe underwater. As he explores the ocean, he meets a wise old octopus named Oracle who becomes his mentor and guide. Together, they embark on a quest to stop a powerful sorcerer who seeks to exploit the ocean's magic for his own gain. Along the way, Lyra learns about the ancient history of the ocean and the secrets of the deep.

In a futuristic underwater city, a group of teenagers must navigate the complexities of high school while also dealing with the challenges of living in a underwater environment. The protagonist, a young man named Kaito, discovers he has the ability to breathe underwater without any assistance. As he explores the city, he meets a group of friends who are also gifted with unique abilities, and together they form a secret team to protect the city from threats both within and outside its walls.

In a world where the ocean is a realm of ancient magic and mythical creatures, a young girl named Luna discovers she has the ability to breathe underwater and communicate with sea creatures. As she explores the ocean, she meets a group of mythical creatures, including a mermaid, a sea dragon, and a giant squid.
